text: Minnie (1923 – October 31, 1976) and Clara Bagelman (October 17, 1920 – November 22, 2014), also known as by the stage names Merna and Claire Barry, or The Barry Sisters, were popular American jazz entertainers. They worked from the 1940s to the 1970s. Minnie and Clara were born in Bronx, New York. Merna Barry died from a brain tumor, age 54. Clara died at age 94. == Other websites == * The Barry Sisters – I Love You Much Too Much on youtube.com Category:Musical groups from New York (state) Category:American jazz singers Category:People from the Bronx
title: The Barry Sisters
